properties.Name: PromissoryNote

Columns.Name: ContractId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Contract.

Columns.Name: PromissoryNoteText
Columns.Description: The complete text of the Promissory Note.

Columns.Name: Date
Columns.Description: The date that the Promissory Note is made, which should be the same as the date that the funds are transferred from the Lender to the Borrower.

Columns.Name: Amount
Columns.Description: The amount that is being loaned.

Columns.Name: PrincipalAmount
Columns.Description: The principal amount of the loan.

Columns.Name: InterestRate
Columns.Description: The annual interest rate of the loan.

Columns.Name: NumberOfPayments
Columns.Description: The number of loan payments that the Borrower will make to the Lender.

Columns.Name: PaymentAmount
Columns.Description: The amount of each installment payment from the Borrower to the Lender.

Columns.Name: PaymentCommencementDate
Columns.Description: The date that the first payment is to be made.

Columns.Name: PrincipalDueDate
Columns.Description: The date upon which the entire principal amount is be repaid.

Columns.Name: FirstPrepayDate
Columns.Description: The earliest date that the borrower is allowed to prepay the principal amount.

Columns.Name: SecuritySection
Columns.Description: This section describes any collateral for the Promissory Note that has been put up by the borrower.

Properties.Description: A contract establishing the obligations of a borrower to repay a debt with interest.

properties.Description: A contract establishing the obligations of a borrower to repay a debt with interest.
